overview: Ikuya Yamada is a serial entrepreneur and an experienced software engineer. Currently, he is the founder and the CTO of Studio Ousia Inc., a software R&D company founded in 2007 in Tokyo. He is also a senior visiting researcher at the Keio Research Institute at SFC from 2010. Prior to Studio Ousia, he was the CTO of a listed Japanese software company named Fractalist Inc. and previously the founder and the CEO of a software R&D company called Newrong Inc., which was acquired by Fractalist Inc. in 2005. He obtained his B.S. (2006) and M.S. (2010) from Keio University.
